name: Ignition Extinction
description:
Controls
W,A,S,D - Movement Keys
Space - Jump
Alt + F4 - Exit

Ignition Extinction Is a game where you play as a spirit to absorb elements and grow your aura to consume points by destroying the environment, The idea is to get as many points possible, you can score higher by scoring in quick succession in order to keep your combo meter running and racking up to large points after a successful and flawless combo, but be careful because if you ignite an object and its been saved from destruction by the guardians your total combo will be diminished.

Game currently has no ending as of yet but you're able to always re-launch the game for more attempts of getting a larger score.
